title: Wiki2touch October dump file - Offline Wikipedia viewing
description:
This torrent contains the English October 2008 articles.bin file to be used in conjunction with Wiki2touch (http://code.google.com/p/wiki2touch/).

This basically allows you to carry full text copy of Wikipedia on your jailbroken iPhone or iPod Touch.

Normally you need to spend a lot of time downloading and converting the dump files, so I thought I'll share my updated files on my blog http://wikidump.blogspot.com/

Usage:

- Jailbreak your iPhone or iPod Touch
- Install wikisrvd, OpenSSH and Bossprefs using Cydia
- Use SFTP (using media:alpine username:password) to copy articles.bin to Media/Wikipedia/en folder)
- Turn on Wiki2Touch in Bossprefs

Enjoy the sum of human knowledge on the go!
